com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

Class PaintTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.PaintTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanvasCommitObserver, SurfaceInteractionObserver, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractBoundsTool, AbstractLineTool, AbstractPathTool, AbstractPolylineTool, AbstractSelectionTool, ArrowTool, FillTool, MagnifierTool, TextTool

    public abstract class PaintTool
extends java.lang.Object
implements SurfaceInteractionObserver, CanvasCommitObserver
    A base tool class holding common attribute providers (like stroke, fill and font), plus empty, template methods for keyboard and mouse events.

                     java.awt.image.BufferedImage canvasImage)
        Description copied from interface: CanvasCommitObserver
        Fires when an new shape or image is committed from scratch onto the canvas.
        Specified by:
        onCommit in interface CanvasCommitObserver
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas on which the commit is occurring.
        changeSet - The set of changes being committed.
        canvasImage - The resulting canvas image (including the committed change)

      • mouseDragged

        public void mouseDragged(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e,
                         java.awt.Point imageLocation)
        Description copied from interface: SurfaceInteractionObserver
        Invoked when a mouse button is pressed on a component and then dragged. MOUSE_DRAGGED events will continue to be delivered to the component where the drag originated until the mouse button is released (regardless of whether the mouse position is within the bounds of the component).

        Due to platform-dependent Drag&Drop implementations, MOUSE_DRAGGED events may not be delivered during a native Drag&Drop operation.

        Specified by:
        mouseDragged in interface SurfaceInteractionObserver
